name: Aquatics - Preschool Swim
description: This level continues to focus on building more comfort and enjoyment in the water using songs, games and play. While introducing more structured play in the areas of bobbing, breath control, floating, gliding and kicking on front and back, in addition to arm rotations and other elementary skills. Children ages 3 and under are required to wear swim diapers while in the pool. The ratio is 1 adult per child.

howToGetIt: Register online at sfrecpark.org/register or call the registration hotline at (628) 652-2900
address: Geary and Steiner Street, San Francisco, CA, 94115
